revised_title: Fossil Reptile Anatomical Discoveries and Monotreme Mammal Connections
tldr: The author examines the fossil reptile Aristodesmus Rütimeyeri, from the Bunter Sandstone of Reihen, and discovers similarities to monotreme mammals. The study provides new evidence of the relation of the Anomodontia to the Monotremata, suggesting that a group called Theropsida might include both Monotremata and Anomodontia.
